p: I am just a self-taught programmer, with no training in web design, graphics, etc. I would gladly welcome any suggestions or contributions to

ul.li: Improve the usability of this site.

Make a better looking robot; I drew Reeborg pixel-by-pixel using a rather primitive drawing program, suitable for my skills level. Note that Reeborg is viewed sideways where its world is (most often) viewed from above; a nicer-looking Reeborg, perhaps viewed from nearly above, might be most welcome.
